TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit PnrpPermission extends System.Security.CodeAccessPermission implements class System.Security.Permissions.IUnrestrictedPermission
Public NotInheritable Class PnrpPermission Inherits CodeAccessPermission Implements IUnrestrictedPermission
public ref class PnrpPermission sealed : System::Security::CodeAccessPermission, System::Security::Permissions::IUnrestrictedPermission
type PnrpPermission = class inherit CodeAccessPermission interface IUnrestrictedPermission

summary.span: 指定在 对象权限中使用的值。

span.span: Specifies the values that are used in object permissions.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认权限允许所有本地和 Intranet 区域的应用程序访问 PNRP 服务。The default permissions allow all local and Intranet zone applications to access PNRP services. 如果未更改默认权限，所有链接-本地和站点本地应用程序都有权访问对等服务，但全局 (internet) 应用程序没有访问权限。If the default permissions are not changed, all link-local and site-local applications have access to Peer-to-Peer services, but global (internet) applications have no access. 此类型的实例具有两种权限状态： 要么已不能访问受权限保护的资源，或者它们具有对这些资源的完全访问权限不受限制。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources.

Public Sub New (state As PermissionState)
public: PnrpPermission(System::Security::Permissions::PermissionState state);
new System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission : System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState -> System.Net.PeerToPeer.PnrpPermission

span.span: One of the values in the enumeration.

summary.span: 初始化具有所提供的初始权限状态的 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied initial permission state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类型的实例具有两种权限状态： 要么已不能访问受权限保护的资源，或者它们具有对这些资源的完全访问权限不受限制。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources. 如果`state`是不受限制的 PnrpPermission 实例允许所有请求。If `state` is Unrestricted, the PnrpPermission instance passes all demands. 如果`state`包含任何其他值，所有请求都失败，PnrpPermission 实例。If `state` contains any other value, the PnrpPermission instance fails all demands.

summary.span: 创建并返回当前 的一个相同副本。

span.span: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current .

returns.span: 具有 IPermission 接口的对象，其实例包含 的当前实例的副本。

span.span: An object with an IPermission interface, whose instance contains a copy of the current instance of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 权限的副本与原始权限资源表示相同的访问权限。A copy of a permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission. 此类型的实例具有两种权限状态： 要么已不能访问受权限保护的资源，或者它们具有对这些资源的完全访问权限不受限制。Instances of this type have two permission states: they either have no access to the resource(s) protected by the permission, or they have unrestricted full access to those resources.

param.span: 用于重新构造权限的 XML 编码。

span.span: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the permission.

summary.span: 通过 XML 编码重新构造具有指定状态的安全对象。

span.span: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表示用于对安全对象进行编码的 XML 对象模型。Represents the XML object model for encoding security objects. 此类不能被继承。This class cannot be inherited. 此类旨在为简单的 XML 对象模型，用于在安全系统中，而不是针对作为常规的 XML 对象模型使用的轻量实现。This class is intended to be a lightweight implementation of a simple XML object model for use within the security system, and not for use as a general XML object model.

abstract member Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Intersect : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限 的权限。

span.span: A permission to with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建并返回一个权限，该权限是当前 与指定权限的交集。

span.span: Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 一个新权限，它表示当前 与指定权限的交集。

span.span: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果交集为空，则此新权限是一个 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: This new permission is a reference ( in Visual Basic) if the intersection is empty.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 两个权限的交集是描述两者共同描述的操作组的权限。The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common. 只有传递两个原始权限的请求将通过该交集。Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection. 以下语句所需是`true`Intersect 方法的所有实现的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Intersect method. X 和 Y 表示不是对象引用`null`引用 (在 Visual Basic 中为 Nothing)。X and Y represent object references that are not a `null` reference (Nothing in Visual Basic). - X.Intersect(X) 返回的值等于 X。X.Intersect(X) returns a value equal to X. - X.Intersect(Y) 返回 Y.Intersect(X) 相同的值。X.Intersect(Y) returns the same value as Y.Intersect(X). - X.Intersect (`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)) 返回`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X.Intersect(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

exception.span: 目标参数不是一个 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），并且不是与当前权限相同的类的实例。

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool IsSubsetOf (System.Security.IPermission target);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance bool IsSubsetOf(class System.Security.IPermission target) cil managed
Public Overrides Function IsSubsetOf (target As IPermission) As Boolean
public: override bool IsSubsetOf(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool override this.IsSubsetOf : System.Security.IPermission -> bool

param.name: target
param.span: 将要测试子集关系的权限。

span.span: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.

param.span: 此权限必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: This permission must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 确定当前 是否为指定权限的子集。

span.span: Determines whether the current is a subset of the specified permission.

returns.span: 如果当前 是指定权限的子集，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当前如果当前权限指定一组操作完全包含指定的权限是指定权限的子集。The current is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission. 例如，表示对访问权限"*C:\example.txt*"是表示对访问权限的子集"*c:\\*"。For example, a permission that represents access to "*C:\example.txt*" is a subset of a permission that represents access to "*C:\\*". 如果此方法返回`true`，当前权限表示对受保护资源的访问权限不超过指定的权限。If this method returns `true`, the current permission represents no more access to the protected resource than does the specified permission. 以下语句所需是`true`IsSubsetOf 方法的所有实现的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the IsSubsetOf method. X、 Y 和 Z 表示对象不是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X, Y, and Z represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.IsSubsetOf(X) 返回`true`。X.IsSubsetOf(X) returns `true`. - 当且仅当 X 和 Y 表示相同的权限集，X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 返回 Y.IsSubsetOf(X) 相同的值。X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns the same value as Y.IsSubsetOf(X) if and only if X and Y represent the same set of permissions. - 如果两者都返回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) 和 Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) `true`，X.IsSubsetOf(Z) 返回`true`。If X.IsSubsetOf(Y) and Y.IsSubsetOf(Z) both return `true`, X.IsSubsetOf(Z) returns `true`. - 如果 X 表示权限状态为一个空 IPermission 对象*无*和 Y 表示一个 IPermission 对象，它`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)，返回 X.IsSubsetOf(Y) `true`。If X represents an empty IPermission object with a permission state of *None* and Y represents an IPermission object that is a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic), X.IsSubsetOf(Y) returns `true`. 如果 Z 也是空的权限，则复合设置操作 X.Union(Z)。此外返回 IsSubsetOf(Y)`true`因为的两个空权限是空的权限。If Z is also an empty permission, the compound set operation X.Union(Z).IsSubsetOf(Y) also returns `true` because the of two empty permissions is an empty permission.

exception.span: 目标参数不是一个 引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ），并且不是与当前权限相同的类的实例。

span.span: The target parameter is not a reference ( in Visual Basic) and is not an instance of the same class as the current permission.

summary.span: 返回一个值，指定当前的 是否不受限制。

span.span: Returns a value specifying whether the current is unrestricted.

returns.span: 如果当前权限不受限制，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 无限制的权限表示对受权限保护的所有资源的访问权限。An unrestricted permission represents access to any and all resources protected by the permission.

Public Overrides Function Union (target As IPermission) As IPermission
public: override System::Security::IPermission ^ Union(System::Security::IPermission ^ target);
abstract member Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission override this.Union : System.Security.IPermission -> System.Security.IPermission

param.name: target
param.span: 与当前权限合并的权限。

span.span: A permission to combine with the current permission.

param.span: 它必须与当前权限属于同一类型。

span.span: It must be of the same type as the current permission.

summary.span: 创建一个权限，该权限是当前 与指定权限的并集。

span.span: Creates a permission that is the union of the current and the specified permission.

returns.span: 一个新权限，表示当前 与指定权限的 。

span.span: A new permission that represents the of the current and the specified permission.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用的结果是一个权限，表示由这两个当前的所有操作和指定的权限。The result of a call to is a permission that represents all the operations represented by both the current and the specified permission. 任何请求都会通过任一权限传递其联合。Any demand that passes either permission passes their union. 以下语句所需是`true`Union 方法的所有实现的。The following statements are required to be `true` for all implementations of the Union method. X 和 Y 表示对象不是`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)。X and Y represent objects that are not a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). - X.Union(X) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(X) returns an object that has the same value as X. - X.Union(Y) 返回具有与 Y.Union(X) 返回的对象相同的值的对象。X.Union(Y) returns an object that has the same value as the object returned by Y.Union(X). - X.Union (`null`引用 (`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中)) 返回具有相同的 X 值的对象。X.Union(a `null` reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic)) returns an object that has the same value as X.

span.span: parameter is invalid.
